faq.question: Can it analyze multiple papers together?
faq.answer: Yes! Pro and Team plans support batch processing and comparative analysis across your entire paper collection.

faq.question: Does it help identify research gaps?
faq.answer: Yes! Our AI identifies areas where research is contradictory, lacking, or incomplete - helping you find original contribution opportunities.

faq.question: Can I organize papers by theme or topic?
faq.answer: Yes! The AI identifies common themes and helps you organize papers by methodology, findings, or research approach.

faq.question: How many papers can I process for a literature review?
faq.answer: Pro plan: 200 papers/month. Team plan: Unlimited papers. Perfect for comprehensive dissertation literature reviews.

faq.question: Do you offer student discounts?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer special pricing for students with valid .edu email addresses. Contact us for student discount codes.
